clauses.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.
clauses.clause_text:
The Personal Data collected on this website is also disclosed by ePlus to third parties acting on its behalf, for processing, communications (such as e-mailing and other mailings) and other purposes consistent with this Privacy Notice.  These recipients include the following:

  • Marketing vendors

case.text: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: Cookies can be placed on your computer both by us and by third parties with whom we have a contractual relationship, such as web analytic services and advertising network services.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: Our websites and emails use a technology known as web beacons (also known as an “action tag” or “clear GIF technology”) that allows the collection of web log information

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: "We process your Personal Data for the following purposes: [...] and/or Marketing Activities"

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
clauses.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.
clauses.clause_text:
Our websites use Social Media Plugins to enable you to easily share information with others.
When you visit our websites, the operator of the social media plugin that is on our website can place a cookie on your computer that lets that operator recognize individuals on their website who have previously visited our sites.

case.text: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

clauses.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
clauses.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.
clauses.clause_text:
On 2024-07-10 07:36:57 UTC, zubairkhatri (31500)  Suspended wrote:
          Great  post, you have pointed out some  fantastic  points , I  likewise  think  this s a very  wonderful website.  North Gaia

case.text: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: We disclose information to third parties who provide us with various business services, including monitoring and maintaining the website, for example.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text:
Our&nbsp.
website and online resources are owned and operated in the United States, and the information you provide may be accessible by our affiliates and vendors in other countries.
If you are visiting this site from a country other than the United States, your information will cross an international boundary.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text:
Google Analytics is used to help make our website work better and to help us understand what parts of the website are being utilized.
Google Analytics uses technical tools, such as first-party cookies and JavaScript code, to collect information about visitors.
Google Analytics service tracks visitors to the site who have JavaScript enabled.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
clauses.clause_text: THE COMPANY’S TOTAL LIABILITY TO YOU FOR ALL DAMAGES, LOSSES AND CAUSES OF ACTION WHETHER IN CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUDING ITS OWN NEGLIGENCE) OR UNDER ANY OTHER LEGAL THEORY (INCLUDING STRICT LIABILITY) SHALL IN NO EVENT EXCEED THE PURCHASE PRICE PAID BY YOU FOR ANY PRODUCT IN CONNECTION WITH WHICH LIABILITY ARISES.

case.text: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

clauses.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
clauses.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.
clauses.clause_text: Our websites and emails use a technology known as web beacons (also known as an “action tag” or “clear GIF technology”) that allows the collection of web log information.

case.text: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
to ask us to make any corrections to inaccurate or incomplete Personal Data we have about you.&nbsp.
You can also request that we erase your Personal Data when it is no longer needed for the purposes for which you provided it

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: You have the right to see and get a copy of your Personal Data, including an electronic copy

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: What Personal Data do we collect about you?

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text: How will we use your Personal Data?

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance
clauses.description: When you're not logged in to a service, but use it repeatedly, it may still feel weird that their terms and conditions can change between one use and the next. However, this does not violate the rule-of-thumb that each new version should be accepted from scratch, without inferring your acceptance from the acceptance of an earlier version. Since no acceptance is inferred from continued use, but only from current use, we rate this as neutral instead of bad.
clauses.clause_text: From time to time we may make changes to this Privacy Statement to reflect changes in our legal obligations or the ways in which we process your Personal Data. . Any changes to this Privacy Statement will be posted on this website.

case.text: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Effective Date: . May 25, 2018

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: If you reject cookies, functionality of the site may be limited, and you may not be able to take advantage of many of the site's features.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text:
There are different ways you can prevent tracking of your online activity.
One of them is setting a preference in your browser that alerts websites you visit that you do not want them to collect certain information about you.
This is referred to as a Do-Not-Track (“DNT”) signal.
Please note that currently our websites and web-based resources do not respond to these signals from web browsers.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: "The Personal Data we process about you includes the following categories of Personal Data: [...] Online identifiers Internet Protocol (IP) address;"

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
